(So the RPG has turned one year old, eh? As I've said before, I am 
really proud of everyone. Sure, we've had misunderstandings and 
fights, but everyone really knows that it's all about having fun. We 
we're all excited about the get together in the chatroom thing, but 
now that summer's over it will be too hard to do. So this is my idea 
now. We add a bit to the members page. We each e-mail in something 
about ourselves, what we've done here, what we'd like to do and 
anything else you want to say. Pictures would be great. If anyone 
else has any ideas, please say so.)

Vulois

Vulois turned to Child, confused at first, but than shocked.

"Child! Did a voice in your head tell you that?"
______________________________________________________________________
Fliq

Fliq heard Ramulus. He looks over his shoulder to find him.

"Oh good! We thought we'd lost you. Come on, Brix is waiting."

Fliq guides Ramulus to the bridge.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream watched the battle from inside the cave. When the bot that 
was leading in Megatron's place returned, he went to her full of rage.

"Thos bots outside made you kill one of our one kind. We should not 
let them get away with that! Let me lead everything we've got out 
there in a counter attack!!!!"
______________________________________________________________________
Noble/Savage

For years the organic beast had been lurking in the shadows of Past 
Earth, with only vague memories of what happened to him on Cybertron 
Being in contact with a spark. Having it removed, and letting him use 
his body freely. Than being encaged by Maximals. It doesn't remember 
how it got here though, only that bots are here and they are fighting 
each other. He has been watching the battles. Watching defenses 
crumble. Now it was his turn. He is too animal-like to make a plan, 
only wanting to destroy. Now is the time. Bots would pay for 
tormenting him on that starnge metalic planet. The beast Noble, and 
the monster Savage, would now destroy.

The Beast started running towards one of the bases.(The Ark)
